name: Toy Flying Car
description:
"Toy Flying Car" is a car racing game. The car controlled by the player can win when it reaches the finish line first
[Game mode]
The game is divided into single player mode and double player mode. The single player mode is divided into competition mode and time mode.
[Game operation]

[Game features]
The game has many different cars to choose from, and different cars have different performances.
You can invite your friends to play two-person mode together, so that the game will become more interesting.
